scenarios.title: Old Man
scenarios.description: You see an old man attempting to cross the road unsuccessfully. It is too busy for him to navigate safely.

successResult.text: You help the old man cross the road safely. He tosses you a coin as a token of appreciation.

failureResult.text: You approach the old man, but he immediately thinks you are mugging him and runs off.

successResult.text: You decide to ignore it. He'll probably be fine on his own.

failureResult.text: You decide to ignore it. He'll probably be fine on his own.
